an4.94:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhi hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa, na labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.94:1.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhi hoti adhipannadhammavipassanaya, na labhi ajjhattam cetosamathassa.
an4.94:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ceva labhi hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa na ca labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.94:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhi ceva hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa labhi ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.94:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo labhi ajjhattam cetosamathassa na labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena yvayam puggalo labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya so upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
an4.94:2.6: ‘evam kho, avuso, sankhara datthabba, evam sankhara sammasitabba, evam sankhara vipassitabba’ti.
an4.94:2.7: So aparena samayena labhi ceva hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa labhi ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.94:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya na labhi ajjhattam cetosamathassa, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena yvayam puggalo labhi ajjhattam cetosamathassa so upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
an4.94:3.7: ‘evam kho, avuso, cittam santhapetabbam, evam cittam sannisadetabbam, evam cittam ekodi katabbam, evam cittam samadahatabban’ti.
an4.94:3.8: So aparena samaye labhi ceva hoti adhipannadhammavipassanaya labhi ca ajjhattam cetosamathassa.
an4.94:4.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo na ceva labhi ajjhattam cetosamathassa na ca labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena yvayam puggalo labhi ceva ajjhattam cetosamathassa labhi ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya so upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
an4.94:4.10: ‘evam kho, avuso, cittam santhapetabbam, evam cittam sannisadetabbam, evam cittam ekodi katabbam, evam cittam samadahatabbam, evam sankhara datthabba, evam sankhara sammasitabba, evam sankhara vipassitabba’ti.
an4.94:4.11: So aparena samayena labhi ceva hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa labhi ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.94:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo labhi ceva hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa labhi ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena tesu ceva kusalesu dhammesu patitthaya uttari asavanam khayaya yogo karaniyo.
an4.94:5.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
